tooltip.html:
Inherited
By default, this option is selected for all nodes below the Processes node. When selected, the node will inherit monitoring choices from its parent.

Enabled
When selected, monitoring choices are individually enabled for this node. (The node does not inherit monitoring choices from its parent.) To select this option, you must first deselect the Inherited option.

Event Severity
Select an event severity (Critical, Error, Warning, Info, or Debug). This severity level is applied to the event created when the process fails.

Pattern
Enter text (as a regular expression) that the system will match to define this process.
For example, to search for the command:
(NEED VALID COMMAND)
enter this pattern:
^.*\/*httpd
interpreted as:
(DEFINE)
More information about: regular expressions

Ignore Parameters
Select this option to ignore command parameters when matching processes. By default, this option is disabled.

Device
Click to display devices on which the selected process or processes are running.

Events
Click to display events associated with the selected process or processes.
